oai_dc:dc.dc:title: American Homes, July 1902
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: American Homes. An Illustrated Magazine Telling How To Plan, How To Build, How To Pay For, How To Beautify Them. Vol. XV, No. 1. July 1902. The Hite-Smith Publishing Co. 156 Fifth Ave., New York City. A Japanese Tea Room. Locating The Home. Only articles by George F. Barber or associates have full text transcriptions.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: architects; architecture
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: George F. Barber Collection--Gift of Michael and Carolyn Dufano
